summary: Comprehensive testing of PlanEd (German teacher work plan app) completed. All 38 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all 11 pages working correctly with proper German localization. Rheinland-Pfalz holidays displayed correctly in calendar.
passed_tests: UI: Classes page shows class cards
UI: Calendar displays lessons and holidays
UI: Statistics page shows charts and export buttons
UI: Settings page shows Rheinland-Pfalz as default
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: Line 501 in server.py - UserResponse now returns 'rheinland-pfalz' correctly
ESLint warnings in frontend about missing useEffect dependencies (non-critical)
seed_data_creation: Created school year '2025/2026', class '5a - Mathematik', and lesson 'Einführung Algebra' for test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Test user 'test@schule.de' has sample data. Rheinland-Pfalz holidays display correctly in calendar. Export buttons (Excel, Word, PDF) visible but not tested for actual file download. AI suggestions endpoint exists but not tested (requires EMERGENT_LLM_KEY).
